summary:
I am a person that values equally the soft and hard skills in the business environment. My over 20 years’ experience in ICT environments (Lottery Business, Telecommunications) has been proven a great lessons learned helper in transforming me from a good ICT engineer to an effective leader. My focus is primarily on the organizational values and mission realized through my integral, honest and knowledgeable behavior. My ultimate target is to contribute to the organizational financial performance through proactive planning and projections towards an effective execution.
A good and effective communicator, a person that puts always great effort in understanding the customer needs and in balancing those with the product delivery.
I am a great supporter of the moto “organizations do not get much done unless their people are motivated and happy” and a continuous former of strong high performance teams.

profile_positions.description: General Manager and BoD memeber of INTRALOT Benelux BV and INTRALOT Netherlands BV; responsible for all processes, tasks and operations of the companies, serving the Nederlandse Loterij (NLO).
profile_positions.title: General Manager

profile_positions.description: Utilizing my (many) years’ experience in the Dutch market and the good customer relationship, I was assigned the role of ICT Operations Director in the newly, back in 2018, established INTRALOT Benelux BV, keeping as well my existing at that time role at Intralot Netherlands as Operations Director. Challenging enough since I had to set up a Dev-Ops team (8FTE) of highly skilled people, that is responsible for the operation of a twenty-four hour, seven day a week, on-line transaction processing system that hosts the gaming systems of our client. At the same time maintain the smooth operation of Intralot Netherlands, the scope of which was gradually phased out by March 2021.
profile_positions.title: ICT Operations Director

profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
Driving operational excellence, maximizing the value of the asset base while ensuring a tight control on operational costs. Responsible for monitoring and continuously improving standards of performance and quality within international operation standards (WLA ISO 27001, ISAE 3402 certified).

Duties:

▪	Managing a team of 35 employees, comprised by Application Operators, System Engineers, Service Delivery Managers and Incident Managers, in a 24/7 work environment. 
▪	Consulting in organizing Help Desk Centers for proper Technical Field Support, meeting strict SLAs and customizing CRM-Oracle Siebel application per project needs.   
▪	Establishing and implementing departmental policies, goals, objectives.
▪	Encouraging, identifying and developing best practices strategy within my team.
▪	Preparing monthly SLA reports relating to the performance of the organization and recommend corrective actions when problems arise.
▪	Leading and directing all Information Technology activities in the region/local organization to ensure optimum systems efficiency.
▪	Being the primary liaison contact person with the Headquarters in Athens for the key Operational Activities, maintaining regular written and in-person communications with the company’s management team.
▪	Being the operational key person and primary business point of contact towards our Dutch clients and subcontractors, ensuring the full alignment between the provider and the customer.
▪	Being responsible for the hiring of, management and the appraisal of the staff required to support the operation. 
▪	Being responsible for the entire Release Management Life cycle (analyzing, sizing, costing, scheduling and deploying).
▪	Being part of the company’s Management committee, Risk and Incident assessment committee.
profile_positions.title: Operations Director

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for client progress meetings on site, managing customer expectations and coordinating the involved resources. Also having worked closely with other departmental managers to promote overall company effectiveness.

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for managing the delivery of critical projects (Turkey, Argentina, Holland, Brazil), and for providing managerial support for key projects conducted by the company. Also responsible for providing monthly financial and technical updates of any known issues/risks to Senior Manager.

Duties:

▪	Responsible for costing, estimating and planning projects.
▪	Preparing Project Initiation documentation.
▪	Maintaining and completing Project Key Performance Indicators.
▪	Writing detailed and summarized project progress reports.
▪	Identifying, costing and processing any contract variations.
▪	Tracking activities against the detailed project plans.
▪	Updating project plans to include agreed changes.
▪	Organising and facilitating Project Steering / Operating Committees meetings.

Assigned at Eurofootball (Sports Betting Operation) in Bulgaria, being responsible for the contractual obligations and assisting Eurofootball’s CEO on the operational tasks and new projects (implementation of the first Live Betting Environment in Bulgaria, and the first Telephone Betting Platform).

Duties:

▪	Identifying, costing and processing demanding contract variation.
▪	Responsible for the Release Management of the new System Functionalities.

profile_positions.description:

▪	Analysing new markets for potential new business opportunities on the gaming sector (Albania, Bosnia Herzegovina).
▪	Preparation of technical responses on international RFPs (Hungary, Egypt, Turkey).

▪	Helping clients meet and exceed their goals.

profile_positions.description:
Being a member of the mobile cellular coverage team, analysing the cellular performance, design new antenna installations (indoor and outdoor) and provide 2nd level of Support to Vodafone’s Customer Care Centre 

Duties:

▪	Responsible for validating the site configuration in the field during the technical site survey visits and preparing the Technical Site Survey reports.

profile_positions.description:
Being a member of the Transmission Support team.

Duties:

▪	Perform preventive maintenance and optimisation in accordance with company equipment specifications.
▪	Carry out reactive maintenance on all network equipment, including faults analysis, restoration and resolution. 
▪	Escalate faults to central help desk if their contribution is needed for timely restoration or final resolution.
▪	Work in conjunction with Subcontractors’ team in analysing and resolving all issues pertaining to the inter-working and integration of the Transport Network. 
▪	Perform network element deployment, migration and re-parenting, parameter changes, software and hardware changes, functionality activations and all necessary configurations. 
▪	Liaise with field teams to solve installation related issues.
